short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darken Duolingo's UI to play without burning your retinas!  This extension affects Duolingo's style only, not its functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on will darken the Duolingo website's UI to put less strain on your eyes. This extension affects Duolingo's style only, not its functionality.
